title: Profiles in Tremendousness - National Security Adviser John Bolton | Sean Penn
itunes:title: Profiles in Tremendousness - National Security Adviser John Bolton | Sean Penn
description:
A Pennsylvania school district arms kids with rocks, Trump picks the hawkish John Bolton as his national security adviser, and Sean Penn talks "Bob Honey Who Just Do Stuff."
